data.author: Forrest Gump
data.quote: My mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.

data.author: The Godfather
data.quote: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.

data.author: On the Waterfront
data.quote: You don't understand!  I coulda had class. I coulda been a contender. I could've been somebody, instead of a bum, which is what I am.

data.author: The Wizard of Oz
data.quote: Toto, I've a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.

data.author: Star Wars
data.quote: May the Force be with you.

data.author: All About Eve
data.quote: Fasten your seatbelts. It's going to be a bumpy night.

data.author: Cool Hand Luke
data.quote: What we've got here is failure to communicate.

data.author: The Silence of the Lambs
data.quote: A census taker once tried to test me. I ate his liver with some fava beans and a nice Chianti.

data.author: Jaws
data.quote: You're gonna need a bigger boat.
